mapper.select: select trans_dv , card_no , instm_month , exp_dt , cvc , trans_amt , val_add_tax , org_unique_id , string_data , ctt , reg_dtm , reg_usr from pay_trans_base where unique_id = #{unique_id}

select dtls.trans_seq , dtls.success_yn , dtls.trans_dv , dtls.unique_id , dtls.org_unique_id , ( case dtls.status when '0' then '결제' when '1' then '부분취소' when '2' then '전체취소' end )as status , dtls.trans_amt , dtls.val_add_tax , dtls.pay_amt , dtls.pay_val_add_tax , dtls.ctt , dtls.reg_dtm , dtls.reg_usr , base.card_no , base.exp_dt , base.cvc from pay_trans_base base, pay_trans_dtls dtls where base.unique_id = dtls.unique_id and dtls.unique_id = #{unique_id}
mapper.update: update pay_trans_dtls set pay_amt = #{pay_amt} , pay_val_add_tax = #{pay_val_add_tax} , ctt = ( case status when '0' then '결제' when '1' then '부분취소' when '2' then '전체취소' end ) || ' 상태' , reg_dtm = now() , reg_usr = 'YEOM_1' where trans_seq = #{trans_seq} and unique_id = #{org_unique_id}
mapper.select: select sum(val_add_tax) from pay_trans_base where org_unique_id = #{org_unique_id} and trans_dv = 'CANCEL'
